API_controller.API package

Submodules

API_controller.API.API_Menus module

Menu API Module

This module provides API routes for managing Menu entities.

Attributes:

router (APIRouter): The APIRouter instance for defining routes. data_instance (Data | None): The instance of Data class for data access.

API_controller.API.API_Menus.create_menu(menu: Menu)[source]

Route for creating a menu.

Args:

menu (Menu): The Menu instance to create.

Returns:

dict: JSON response indicating success or failure.

Raises:

HTTPException: If an error occurs during menu creation.

API_controller.API.API_Menus.data_transmission(data: Data)[source]

Transmit data instance to the API.

Args:

data (Data): The instance of Data class for data access.

API_controller.API.API_Menus.delete_menu(id: int)[source]

Route for deleting a menu.

Args:

id (int): The ID of the menu to delete.

Returns:

dict: JSON response indicating success or failure.

Raises:

HTTPException: If an error occurs during menu deletion.

API_controller.API.API_Menus.get_menu(id: int)[source]

Route for retrieving a menu by ID.

Args:

id (int): The ID of the menu to retrieve.

Returns:

dict: JSON response containing the retrieved menu.

Raises:

HTTPException: If the menu is not found.

async API_controller.API.API_Menus.list_dish()[source]

Récupère la liste de tous les Menus dans la base de données.

Returns:

dict: Un dictionnaire contenant le message de succès et la liste des Menus.

Raises:

HTTPException: Si une erreur se produit lors de la récupération de la liste des Menus.

async API_controller.API.API_Menus.options_root(id: int)[source]

Route for handling OPTIONS request on menu endpoint with ID.

Args:

id (int): The ID of the menu.

Returns:

JSONResponse: JSON response containing allowed methods.

API_controller.API.API_Menus.setup_routes(app)[source]

Setup routes for Menu API.

Args:

app: The FastAPI application instance.

API_controller.API.API_Menus.update_menu(id: int, menu: Menu)[source]

Route for updating a menu.

Args:

id (int): The ID of the menu to update. menu (Menu): The updated Menu instance.

Returns:

dict: JSON response indicating success or failure.

Raises:

HTTPException: If an error occurs during menu update.

API_controller.API.API_Utils module

API Utilities Module

This module provides utility functions and routes for the API.

Attributes:

router (APIRouter): The APIRouter instance for defining routes. data_instance (Data | None): The instance of Data class for data access.

API_controller.API.API_Utils.data_transmission(data: Data)[source]

Transmit data instance to the API.

Args:

data (Data): The instance of Data class for data access.

API_controller.API.API_Utils.read_root()[source]

Route for root endpoint.

Returns:

dict: JSON response containing welcome message, version, and creator information.

API_controller.API.API_Utils.setup_routes(app)[source]

Setup routes for API utilities.

Args:

app: The FastAPI application instance.
